#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements,Phase-Implementation
= Details =

Details of the [http://www.paypal.com PayPal] function that will process the transaction and return a status code.

==Input Arrays==
===$order_details (array)===
  * $order_number (int8)
  * $sale_amount (int8)

===$customer_details (array)===
  * $customer_number (int16)
  * $email (varchar)

===$billing_details (array)===
  * $billing_first_name (varchar)
  * $billing_last_name (varchar)
  * $billing_company_name (varchar)
  * $billing_address (varchar)
  * $billing_city (varchar)
  * $billing_state (varchar)
  * $billing_zip (int8)
  * $billing_country (byte)

===$shipping_details (array)===
  * $shipping_first_name (varchar)
  * $shipping_last_name (varchar)
  * $shipping_address (varchar)
  * $shipping_city (varchar)
  * $shipping_state (varchar)
  * $shipping_zip (int8)
  * $shipping_country (byte)

===$cc_info (array)===
  * $credit_card_number (int16)
  * $expiration_date (date)
  * $cvc_code (byte)


==Output Array==
  * $transaction_id (varchar)
  * $authorization_code (varchar)
  * $avs_zip_match (boolean)
  * $avs_street_match (boolean)
  * $CVC_match (boolean)


==Constants==
  _Possible Values: Authorization, Credit, Delayed_Capture, Sale_
  * TransactionType = Sale
  _Possible Values: Live, Test_
  * TransactionMode = Test
